tutorials.title: Craft a Prompt for Question Generation
tutorials.description: Build a generative AI app to generate questions for educational topics using prompt builder and Python.

tutorials.title: Explore Different Models
tutorials.description: Experiment with various models and update your application code accordingly.

tutorials.title: Apply Structured Outputs using JSON Schema
tutorials.description: Implement structured outputs using JSON Schema to generate consistent, machine-readable responses.

tutorials.title: Bulk Run Prompts against LLM Generated Dataset
tutorials.description: Bulk run prompts with variables against LLM generated datasets

tutorials.title: Evaluate Prompts with Built in and Custom Evaluator
tutorials.description: Create and run prompt evaluations using both custom code-based and built-in evaluators.
